name: IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP) 2019
content: IEEE ICIP is the world's largest and most comprehensive technical conference focused on image and video processing and computer vision, taking place 22-25 September 2019 in Taipei, Taiwan. We invite you to submit your research to be presented at the conference, which will feature world-class speakers, tutorials, exhibits, and innovation programs that include grand challenges, prominent industry talks, and showcases. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to: Sensing, Representation, and Modeling Image & Video Analysis and Segmentation Synthesis, Rendering, and Visualization Motion Estimation, Registration and Fusion Image & Video Perception and Quality Models Biomedical and Biological Image Processing Computational Imaging Filtering and Multiresolution Processing Detection, Recognition, and Classification Interpolation, Super-resolution, and Mosaicing And many more Paper submission is now open until 31 January 2019.
